snippet: Some consumer advocates are warning that the merger of American Airlines and US Airways, if approved, could bring rising fees and fares as well as service cuts to smaller cities.
abstract: Some consumer advocates are warning that the merger of American Airlines and US Airways, if approved, could bring higher fees and fares as well as service cuts to smaller cities.
lead_paragraph: Some consumer advocates are warning that the merger of American Airlines and US Airways, if approved, could bring rising fees and fares as well as service cuts to smaller cities.

headline.seo: Service Cuts May Arise With Merger of Airlines
headline.main: Service Cuts May Follow Merger of Airlines
headline.print_headline: Service Cuts May Arise With Merger Of Airlines
